title: #82: Hiding in Plain Sight
description:
The RCP team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) are dropping this episode as a direct response to the media coverage of the singer Robert Kelly's abuse of young girls and women. Find out why the #RCP team are fired up and the team throw down a call to action for our listeners.


#ClosePerpetratorsDown

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime
